original_text: So they sought for a fair damsel throughout all the coasts of Israel, and found Abishag a Shunammite, and brought her to the king.
korean_text: 이스라엘 사방 영토 내에 아리따운 처녀를 구하던 중 수넴 여자 아비삭을 얻어 왕께 데려왔으니

sentences.original_text: So they sought for a fair damsel
throughout all the coasts of Israel
and brought her to the king
